mapper.select: SELECT Q.*,F.FTRUCK_NAME FROM QA_SELLER Q,ORDERS O,LICENSE L,FOODTRUCK F WHERE O.LICENSE_NO = L.LICENSE_NO AND F.LICENSE_NO = O.LICENSE_NO AND L.LICENSE_NO = O.LICENSE_NO AND Q.MEM_ID = O.MEM_ID AND L.MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY Q.QA_SEL_STAT ASC,Q.QA_SEL_NO ASC

SELECT Q.QA_SEL_NO,Q.MEM_ID,Q.ORD_NO,SUBSTR(Q.QA_SEL_TITLE,1,10)AS QA_SEL_TITLE,Q.QA_SEL_CONTENT,Q.QA_SEL_REG,Q.QA_SEL_CATEGORY1,Q.QA_SEL_CATEGORY2,Q.QA_SEL_TEL,Q.QA_SEL_STAT FROM QA_SELLER Q , MEMBER M WHERE Q.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID AND LENGTH(Q.QA_SEL_TITLE) > 0 AND M.MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY Q.QA_SEL_STAT ASC,Q.QA_SEL_NO ASC

SELECT Q.QA_SC_NO,Q.MEM_ID,Q.LICENSE_NO,SUBSTR(Q.QA_SC_TITLE,1,10)AS QA_SC_TITLE,Q.QA_SC_CONTENT,Q.QA_SC_REG,Q.QA_SC_CATEGORY1,Q.QA_SC_CATEGORY2,Q.QA_SC_TEL,Q.QA_SC_STAT FROM QA_SC Q , MEMBER M WHERE Q.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID AND LENGTH(Q.QA_SC_TITLE) > 0 AND M.MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY Q.QA_SC_STAT ASC,Q.QA_SC_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, MEM_AUTH) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberTel}, #{memberAuth})
mapper.select: SELECT LICENSE.LICENSE_NO AS LICENSE_NO FROM MEMBER INNER JOIN LICENSE ON MEMBER.MEM_ID = LICENSE.MEM_ID WHERE MEMBER.MEM_ID=#{selId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QA_SELLER (QA_SEL_NO, MEM_ID, ORD_NO, QA_SEL_TITLE, QA_SEL_CONTENT, QA_SEL_REG, QA_SEL_CATEGORY1, QA_SEL_CATEGORY2, QA_SEL_TEL) VALUES (QA_SEL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{ordNo}, #{qaSelTitle}, #{qaSelContent}, SYSDATE, #{qaSelCategory1}, #{qaSelCategory2}, #{qaSelTel})

INSERT INTO QA_SC (QA_SC_NO, MEM_ID, LICENSE_NO, QA_SC_TITLE, QA_SC_CONTENT, QA_SC_REG, QA_SC_CATEGORY1, QA_SC_CATEGORY2, QA_SC_TEL) VALUES (QA_SC_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{licenseNo}, #{qaScTitle}, #{qaScContent}, SYSDATE, #{qaScCategory1}, #{qaScCategory2}, #{qaScTel})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QA_SC WHERE QA_SC_STAT='N' AND LICENSE_NO IS NULL
